content.value: Mürren is a traditional Walser mountain village located just below the Schilthorn at 1,650 metres above sea level. This idyllic village is car-free. It has 450 residents, its own school, as well as an English and a Roman Catholic church. Mürren is suitable as a starting point for hikes and is an attractive location for winter athletes who would like to enjoy the magnificent view of Eiger, Mönch and Jungfrau.
This mountain railway ticket is valid for the return trip from the selected departure station via Grütschalp to Mürren.

The mountain railway ticket is personal, non-refundable,& non-transferable and can only be used on the day of validity. After successful booking, you can print out your ticket at any time as a PDF from your user account or add it to your wallet as a mobile ticket.
